text: The Neurobiology Research Center (NRC) is a specialized research centre in the premises of the National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences, Bangalore, India.http://presidentofindia.nic.in/speeches-detail.htm?473 The centre provides infrastructure to support translational research and development of cutting-edge technology in frontier areas of neuroscience.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/Nimhans-to- get-1st-genetic- repository/articleshow/50665281.cmshttp://www.deccanherald.com/content/220898/nimhans- get-advanced-research- centre.htmlhttp://www.pharmabiz.com/NewsDetails.aspx?aid=93608&sid;=1 NRC houses fourteen research laboratories and four central facilities including the Human Brain Museum, the only one of its kind in India.http://www.nimhans.ac.in/neuropathology/brain- museumhttp://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/takes- guts-to-get-these- brains/article5063248.ecehttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/Over-600-samples- on-display-at-Nimhans-Brain-Museum/articleshow/8068212.cms ==Facilities and infrastructure== {| class="toccolours" style="float:right; background:#ffc; margin-left:0em; font-size:90%; line-height:1.5em; width:230px;" !
